paper_title.ja: GFFD空間変形手法に基づくカメラ画像からの簡易足型モデリング
paper_title.en: 3D Virtual Foot Modeling from Multiple Camera Image Data Based on the GFFD Deformation Method

description.ja: This paper proposes a novel method of generating a 3D virtual foot model from multiple camera image data based on the GFFD deformation method. 3D virtual foot models for individual persons can be generated easily and rapidly with considerably low cost. By estimating the cause of errors that can occur in the whole process and endeavoring to lower the errors, we succeeded to achieve satisfactory accuracy. The errors are mainly classified into two kinds. One occurs in transforming process with use of the GFFD deformation method and the other in obtaining 3D coordinates of feature points. So, we devoted ourselves to eliminate the cause of both errors and repeated experiments again and again. As a result, we got to get a 3D virtual foot model within acceptable error range. The average error is 1.32∼1.72mm.
description.en: This paper proposes a novel method of generating a 3D virtual foot model from multiple camera image data based on the GFFD deformation method. 3D virtual foot models for individual persons can be generated easily and rapidly with considerably low cost. By estimating the cause of errors that can occur in the whole process and endeavoring to lower the errors, we succeeded to achieve satisfactory accuracy. The errors are mainly classified into two kinds. One occurs in transforming process with use of the GFFD deformation method and the other in obtaining 3D coordinates of feature points. So, we devoted ourselves to eliminate the cause of both errors and repeated experiments again and again. As a result, we got to get a 3D virtual foot model within acceptable error range. The average error is 1.32∼1.72mm.

paper_title.ja: 並列処理を用いた樹木アニメーション制作支援システムにかんする研究
paper_title.en: A Study on Production Support System for Animation of Swaying Trees with Use of Parallel Processing

description.ja: In this paper, we propose a parallel processing technique for creating animation of swaying trees in the wind based on physical simulation. Our technique independently assigns each tree to computation nodes. The each node processes not only parallel rendering for tree shapes, but also parallel simulation of the wind and bending of branches. This independency reduces data traffics between nodes and realizes efficient parallel processing. When the each node independently simulates the wind, it is necessary to consider wind interactions between the upper and the lower side tree. Therefore, we realize cooperative wind simulation with independent cluster nodes, by inventing a novel method for estimates of wind velocity of lower-side trees from simulation results of upper-side trees. By synthesizing rendered images from each cluster, our system generates animations of swaying trees. Through many experiments using these techniques, it is shown that the efficiency of parallel processing for animation of swaying trees is verified.
description.en: In this paper, we propose a parallel processing technique for creating animation of swaying trees in the wind based on physical simulation. Our technique independently assigns each tree to computation nodes. The each node processes not only parallel rendering for tree shapes, but also parallel simulation of the wind and bending of branches. This independency reduces data traffics between nodes and realizes efficient parallel processing. When the each node independently simulates the wind, it is necessary to consider wind interactions between the upper and the lower side tree. Therefore, we realize cooperative wind simulation with independent cluster nodes, by inventing a novel method for estimates of wind velocity of lower-side trees from simulation results of upper-side trees. By synthesizing rendered images from each cluster, our system generates animations of swaying trees. Through many experiments using these techniques, it is shown that the efficiency of parallel processing for animation of swaying trees is verified.

paper_title.ja: 対話的な室内音響設計のための高速な音響生成システム
paper_title.en: A Fast Acoustics Generation System for the Interactive Design of Room Acoustics

description.ja: Not only the sense of sight, but the sense of hearing is important to construct the virtual space with more reality. In general, a cost to calculate the sound exceeds a cost to calculate the image greatly, so it is difficult to realize the interactive virtual reality with acoustics. In this paper, we propose a method of calculating the transition of acoustics corresponding to movement of the user by fixation of the position of a sound source in virtual space. In our method, it is possible to realize the interactive acoustics by decreasing the window size of FFT, and introducing the multi buffer system.
description.en: Not only the sense of sight, but the sense of hearing is important to construct the virtual space with more reality. In general, a cost to calculate the sound exceeds a cost to calculate the image greatly, so it is difficult to realize the interactive virtual reality with acoustics. In this paper, we propose a method of calculating the transition of acoustics corresponding to movement of the user by fixation of the position of a sound source in virtual space. In our method, it is possible to realize the interactive acoustics by decreasing the window size of FFT, and introducing the multi buffer system.

paper_title.ja: GFFDに基づく顔形状モデリングに関する研究
アセンブリモデルを用いた手機織機の表現
paper_title.en: Study on Representation of Assembly Models for the Hand Loom Machine

description.ja: 近年では,複雑な機構をもつ組立品までも3次元CADによって設計されるようになっているが,紐のように不定形なオブジェクトを扱うことは依然として難しい.本論文では,不定形なオブジェクトを特徴点で代表して扱うことで,アセンブリモデルの枠組みに組み込むことを提案する.提案したモデルを用いて表現した手機織機において,いくつかの部品の状態を変化させるだけでアニメーションが作成できることを示す.
description.en: The recent 3D-CAD has a performance to represent complicated mechanisms of a machine structure. On the other hand, it is still difficult to treat the object that is an indeterminate shape such as a string. We already proposed a method of representing the part as the combination of the shape and feature points. This framework is applicable to the indeterminate shape as a string. In this paper, we present the representation method of the hand loom machine by using the framework, and animations on the represented model can be made only by moving some parts.

paper_title.ja: 背景画における陰影付け技法に基づくアニメ制作のための樹木の色域別レンダリング

paper_title.en: Computer animation of swaying trees based on physical simulation

description.en: This paper presents a series of techniques for generating animations of trees swaying in the wind, in consideration of the influences that the tree shapes and leaf sizes give to the air current. To do the simulation of the wind around a tree having a complicated shape, it is necessary to consider the influence that some objects obstructing the wind such as leaves or branches give. Generally, the following problem occurs when we use the incompressible Navier Stokes equations in a physical simulation model of the wind. Computational complexity increases because of considering the details of tree shapes, so it is difficult to generate the animations in real-time. Therefore, this paper proposes a novel method that reduces the computational complexity and realizes an animation in real-time, by means of a boundary condition map expressing space distribution of resistances from tree models automatically. In this case, we treat the parts that have similar shapes such as leaves and branches as simple damping factors decreasing the wind velocity. And also, it has another advantage that the influences between a tree and others can be rapidly calculated by using a hierarchical calculation method. Finally, through many experiments using these methods, it is shown that real-time animations of swaying trees in the wind can be realized. (c) 2006 Elsevier Ltd. All rights reserved.

paper_title.ja: 高精度モーションスピード制御によるバーチャルエアロビクスシステム
大局的空間変形手法に基づく意匠デザインツールの提案
paper_title.en: A Proposal of an Intuitive Design Tool Based on Global Space Deformation

description.ja: Due to the wide spread use of CAD systems, the design period of commercial products has been shortened and the reliability of products has been improved. For many commercial products, the exterior design is one of the most important processes in the design. Most designers use pens to design. Although CAD systems are widely used in industries, they are yet to be replaced by pens for designers. Inthis research, we aim at developing a design tool, which can be intuitively used by designers. As the fundamental theory of deformations, global space deformation is used. For the ease and intuitiveness of deformation, some extensions of global space deformation are presented. We have confirmed the effectiveness of our appmach by experimentally designing a telephone and a bucket seat using the design toll proposed.
description.en: Due to the wide spread use of CAD systems, the design period of commercial products has been shortened and the reliability of products has been improved. For many commercial products, the exterior design is one of the most important processes in the design. Most designers use pens to design. Although CAD systems are widely used in industries, they are yet to be replaced by pens for designers. Inthis research, we aim at developing a design tool, which can be intuitively used by designers. As the fundamental theory of deformations, global space deformation is used. For the ease and intuitiveness of deformation, some extensions of global space deformation are presented. We have confirmed the effectiveness of our appmach by experimentally designing a telephone and a bucket seat using the design toll proposed.

research_project_title.ja: シュミレーションベースのアニメ制作支援ツールの包括的構築

description.ja: 風に揺れる樹木などのアニメの背景要素について、物理シミュレーションを用いながらも高速化を図り、アニメ制作者の意図を迅速に反映しうるアニメ制作支援ツールを開発する研究

research_project_title.ja: 複雑な背景動画像を対象とする高機能映像生成・合成システムの包括的構築

description.ja: 動画像の中でも最も複雑で困難な対象のひとつである、樹木が風に揺れる様子などの複雑な背景要素のシームレスな動画像生成・合成技術に取り組む研究

research_project_title.ja: 簡易足型モデリングに関する研究

description.ja: デジタルカメラで複数の方向から取った画像データから、個人の足型モデルを１ｍｍ以内の精度で安価に作成する研究

research_project_title.ja: 顔モデリングに関する研究

description.ja: デジタルカメラで２～３方向から撮った画像情報から、個人の顔形状を迅速かつ低コストで３Ｄモデルとして再現し、その個人にふさわしい表情や髪型を自動生成するなどの研究

research_project_title.ja: 風に揺れる樹木のシミュレーションに関する研究

description.ja: 風に揺れる樹木の物理シミュレーションを高速に行う独自の手法を開発しており、複数（数十～百）の樹木が同時に揺れて動く様子をリアルタイムに表示することが可能。

research_project_title.ja: バーチャル(デジタル）ヒューマンに関する研究

description.ja: 個人の体形モデルを人体の主要な寸法値に基づいて迅速かつ低コストで生成する研究

research_project_title.ja: 一般化空間変形手法（GFFD)に関する研究

description.ja: ガウス関数や線形ノルムを基底関数とする独自の空間変形手法の開発とその応用 バーチャルヒューマンの研究やデザインツールとして生かされる。

research_project_title.ja: 衣服モデリングに関する総合的研究

description.ja: 衣服の３次元的デザイン手法の提案と作成された衣服に関する動的シミュレーション（水に濡れた衣服が風に揺れる様子など）に関する研究

research_project_title.ja: 機織機などの歴史的機械（機械遺産）のアセンブリモデルに関する研究

description.ja: 機織機などの過去の複雑な機構をもつ機械のバーチャル表示を目的とするアセンブリモデルに関する研究

research_project_title.ja: バーチャルヒューマンに関する総合的研究

description.ja: 顔モデリング、表情モデリング、足型モデリング、体形モデリング、筋肉モデリング、皮膚モデリングなどを含むバーチャル（デジタル）ヒューマンに関する総合的研究
